verses.roman:
āmi āra rūpa--tāra jyeṣṭha-sahodara
āmā-doṅhā-saṅge teṅha rahe nirantara

synonyms: āmi—I; āra—and; rūpa—Rūpa Gosvāmī; tāra—his; jyeṣṭha-sahodara—elder brothers; āmā-doṅhā—the two of us; saṅge—with; teṅha—he; rahe—remains; nirantara—continuously.
translation: "Rūpa and I are his elder brothers. He stayed with us continuously.
